name: Doki Doki Meme Club
summary: Are you tired of playing through depressing mods that have a heartbreaking ending? Or just burnt out on having to deal with all of the horrors that the characters must endure? Want to flip the sadness on its head? Then this mod is a must-see for you! The club members delve into the wonderful world of memes rather than literature, yet still have their own quirky problems to deal with
